author: Seaware

changelog.release_notes: Version 1.6 fixes an issue that causes the watchface to change to GMT for some users rather than staying on the local timezone.
Fixed local time calculation due to time zone differences in Pebble's SDK3
Added Pebble Time Round support, more time zones, better local time tracking, and optional weekday display.

This v1.3 release changes to a more dependable source of GMT for timezone calculations. The prior versions used a less reliable server. If you have experienced more than one timezone shifting by several hours, then this update is for you! The Casablanca timezone has also been updated to include daylight savings time which is in effect.

description: Do you travel or work with people in other time zones? This watchface displays up to 5 time zones around the world. It also has an optional date in 5 languages. It synchronizes to GMT and keeps track of daylight saving time rules in each region. You can also adjust the background color and it works in 12 or 24 hour modes.

latest_release.release_notes: Version 1.6 fixes an issue that causes the watchface to change to GMT for some users rather than staying on the local timezone.

title: World Watch
